content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the court decided to award the applicant with personal ownership of half of an apartment which is registered under the defendants name the defendant was also awarded personal ownership of the other half of the apartment the case involves matrimonial property and references specific articles of the civil code the applicant filed for divorce and requested an equal division of the shared apartment the court granted the applicants request for legal aid and exempted them from certain costs the court has now ordered the division of the matrimonial property and dissolved the marriage the apartment valued at eur 46300 will be divided equally between the parties involved the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of legal aid and stamp duty the state will also pay a stamp duty to the defendant
